mapper.select: SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , T101.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , T101.CRET_DT AS CRET_DT , T101.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , T103.USER_NM AS CRETR_NM , T101.CHG_DT AS CHG_DT , T101.CHGR_ID AS CHGR_ID , T104.USER_NM AS CHGR_NM , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID AS ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM AS OBJ_ABBR_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.PATH_OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T102.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T102 ON (T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_USER_M T103 ON (T101.CRETR_ID = T103.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_USER_M T104 ON (T101.CHGR_ID = T104.USER_ID) WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '060101L'

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , T101.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , T101.CRET_DT AS CRET_DT , T101.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , T103.USER_NM AS CRETR_NM , T101.CHG_DT AS CHG_DT , T101.CHGR_ID AS CHGR_ID , T104.USER_NM AS CHGR_NM , T101.ADM_OBJ_ID AS ADM_OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM AS OBJ_NM , T101.OBJ_ABBR_NM AS OBJ_ABBR_NM , T101.OBJ_DESC AS OBJ_DESC , T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.PATH_OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T102.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM , D2.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS GUIDE_ID FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D1 ON (T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = D1.OBJ_ID AND d1.atr_id_seq=101 AND D1.ATR_VAL_SEQ=101) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T102 ON (T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_USER_M T103 ON (T101.CRETR_ID = T103.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_USER_M T104 ON (T101.CHGR_ID = T104.USER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D2 ON (T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = D2.OBJ_ID AND D2.atr_id_seq=109 AND D2.ATR_VAL_SEQ=101) WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '050201L' AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D1.OBJ_ATR_VAL = ${serverDiv}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT OBJ_TYPE_ID ,OBJ_ID ,OBJ_NM ,OBJ_DESC ,PM_USER ,MEM_USER ,SDATE ,EDATE ,WM_CONCAT(TOOLS) AS TOOLS ,CATE FROM ( SELECT M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID ,M1.OBJ_ID ,M1.OBJ_NM ,M1.OBJ_DESC ,U1.USER_NM AS PM_USER ,WM_CONCAT(U2.USER_NM) AS MEM_USER ,D3.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS SDATE ,D4.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS EDATE ,M2.OBJ_NM AS TOOLS ,D5.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS CATE FROM PEN_OBJ_M M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D1 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D1.OBJ_ID AND D1.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND D1.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_USER_M U1 ON(U1.USER_ID = D1.OBJ_ATR_VAL) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D2 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D2.OBJ_ID AND D2.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_USER_M U2 ON(U2.USER_ID = D2.OBJ_ATR_VAL) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D3 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D3.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D3.OBJ_ID AND D3.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND D3.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D4 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D4.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D4.OBJ_ID AND D4.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND D4.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 102 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_R R1 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = R1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = R1.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_R R2 ON(R1.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = R2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND R1.REL_OBJ_ID = R2.OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M M2 ON(M2.OBJ_TYPE_ID = R2.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M2.OBJ_ID = R2.REL_OBJ_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D5 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D5.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D5.OBJ_ID AND D5.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND D5.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) WHERE M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '060101L' GROUP BY M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID,M1.OBJ_ID,M1.OBJ_NM,M1.OBJ_DESC,U1.USER_NM,D3.OBJ_ATR_VAL,D4.OBJ_ATR_VAL,M2.OBJ_NM,D5.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) GROUP BY OBJ_TYPE_ID,OBJ_ID,OBJ_NM,OBJ_DESC,PM_USER,MEM_USER,SDATE,EDATE,CATE ) WHERE 1=1
AND CATE IN(${cateIds})

SELECT M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID , M1.OBJ_ID , M1.ADM_OBJ_ID , M1.OBJ_NM , M1.OBJ_DESC , U1.USER_NM AS PM_USER , C1.CD_NM AS CATE , C2.CD_NM AS TYPE , D4.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS SDATE , D5.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS EDATE , D6.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS PURPOSE , D7.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS EXPECT , D8.OBJ_ATR_VAL AS OPEN_YN FROM PEN_OBJ_M M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D1 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D1.OBJ_ID AND D1.ATR_ID_SEQ = 101 AND D1.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_USER_M U1 ON(U1.USER_ID = D1.OBJ_ATR_VAL) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D2 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D2.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D2.OBJ_ID AND D2.ATR_ID_SEQ = 103 AND D2.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_CD_M C1 ON(C1.CD_GRP_ID = 'SYS_ANALAREA' AND C1.CD_ID = D2.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D3 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D3.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D3.OBJ_ID AND D3.ATR_ID_SEQ = 104 AND D3.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_CD_M C2 ON(C2.CD_GRP_ID = 'SYS_ANALSJTTYPE' AND C2.CD_ID = D3.OBJ_ATR_VAL ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D4 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D4.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D4.OBJ_ID AND D4.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND D4.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D5 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D5.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D5.OBJ_ID AND D5.ATR_ID_SEQ = 105 AND D5.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 102 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D6 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D6.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D6.OBJ_ID AND D6.ATR_ID_SEQ = 106 AND D6.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D7 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D7.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D7.OBJ_ID AND D7.ATR_ID_SEQ = 107 AND D7.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D8 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D8.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D8.OBJ_ID AND D8.ATR_ID_SEQ = 108 AND D8.ATR_VAL_SEQ = 101 ) WHERE M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '060101L' AND M1.OBJ_ID = #{taskId}

SELECT U1.USER_ID , U1.USER_NM , U1.ORG_ID , U1.EMAIL_ADDR , U1.HP_NO FROM PEN_OBJ_M M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_D D1 ON(M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = D1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND M1.OBJ_ID = D1.OBJ_ID AND D1.ATR_ID_SEQ = 102) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_USER_M U1 ON(U1.USER_ID = D1.OBJ_ATR_VAL) WHERE M1.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '060101L' AND M1.OBJ_ID = #{taskId}
SELECT CD_ID AS CODE, CD_NM AS NAME, CD_NM AS DISP_NAME FROM PEN_CD_M WHERE CD_GRP_ID = 'SYS_ANALAREA' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_NO
